title: Lettering Style Webfont
content:
Hello!

Wondering if anyone knows of a webfont in a style similar to the hand-lettering of this sample, specifically the "Where Foodies Shop" headline:

[http://media-cache-cd0.pinimg.com/736x/dc/e4/d9/dce4d9a738d84f1f3f9b7784...](http://web.archive.org/web/20141008121854/http:/media-cache-cd0.pinimg.com/736x/dc/e4/d9/dce4d9a738d84f1f3f9b778456324671.jpg "http://media-cache-cd0.pinimg.com/736x/dc/e4/d9/dce4d9a738d84f1f3f9b778456324671.jpg")

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141008121854im_/http:/typophile.com/files/dce4d9a738d84f1f3f9b778456324671_6047.jpg)

Thanks in advance! You guys are the best!!

Caitlin
author: imuhwinner
